Summary Note:
Julia Dominique Bühler and the RM crossed paths at a tech conference in Zürich. They attended several keynote sessions together and realized they had a shared vision for the future of technology investments.
Julia Dominique Bühler is a 40 year old Private Equity Investor from Switzerland.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Julia Dominique Bühler is currently single. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
Julia completed her secondary education at Kantonsschule Wettingen Wettingen in 2003.
Julia earned her degree from University of Fribourg in 2007.
Occupation History:
Julia Dominique Bühler is a seasoned professional with over 17 years of experience.
In 2008, Julia Dominique Bühler started working as a Investment Banker at UBS AG, marking the beginning of her successful career.
In 2011, she moved to UBS AG to work as a Private Equity Investor, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 300000 CHF, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
She has condo located in Zurich, worth 2420000 CHF.


In addition to her career success, she also received an inheritance of 1910000 CHF from her late grandmother, a renowned Real Estate Developer, in 2018.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
